identity.mission: Create a top 1% service-based website that blends modern minimalism with organic warmth. Avoid generic 'SaaS' looks.

headings.usage: Use for all H1, H2, H3. Create editorial tension with large sizes.

body.usage: Use for paragraphs, UI elements, buttons.

usage.background: Main page background. Avoid pure white #FFFFFF.
usage.primary: Main CTAs, active states, key icons.
usage.text: Use #1A1A1A for headings, #4A4A4A for body. Never pure black.

spacing.base: Use 2-3x more spacing than typical. Minimum section padding: py-20 or py-24.

grids.marketing: Use 'Tetris' grid (asymmetric col-span) for galleries and feature showcases.
grids.catalog: Use clean 3-4 column grid (gap-8) for rental products.

buttons.primary: bg-[#8DA399] text-white hover:bg-[#7A8F85] transition-all duration-300 shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl hover:-translate-y-0.5
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border border-[#1A1A1A] text-[#1A1A1A] hover:bg-[#1A1A1A] hover:text-white transition-all duration-300

cards.style: Minimalist. No visible border by default. Subtle bg-white/50 hover:bg-white transition-all duration-300.
cards.hover: Scale image slightly (1.05) on hover. Shadow-lg on hover.

navigation.style: Floating 'Glass' pill. Fixed at top, centered or full width with padding.
navigation.classes: bg-white/70 backdrop-blur-md border border-white/20 shadow-sm rounded-full px-8 py-4 mt-4 mx-auto max-w-5xl z-50

visual_enhancers.texture: Add a subtle noise texture overlay (opacity 0.03) to the entire body to kill digital flatness.

motion.reveal: Use framer-motion for staggered entrance of grid items.
motion.interaction: All interactive elements must have a hover state (scale, color shift, or shadow).

visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use for overlays, sticky headers, and toast notifications. backdrop-blur-xl bg-white/60.

hero.alt: Elegant wedding table setting with floral arrangement

instructions_to_main_agent.general: You are building a high-end event decoration website. It must feel expensive but approachable. Use the 'Organic & Earthy' theme.
setup: Configure Tailwind with the provided colors and fonts.

pages.home: Hero section must be immersive. Use a 'Tetris' grid for the 'Featured Services' section. Include a testimonial slider.
pages.services: List categories with large, high-quality images. Hovering over a category should reveal more details.
pages.rentals: E-commerce style grid. Clean, white space. Filters on the left or top.
pages.detail_page: Split layout. Left side: Sticky image gallery. Right side: Scrollable details and 'Request Quote' form.
pages.contact: Simple, elegant form. Use Shadcn Form component but style it to match the brand (minimalist).

universal_guidelines: Do not use generic 'SaaS Blue' colors.
Do not use 'Inter' font for headings.
Always add hover states to interactive elements.
Ensure high contrast for text accessibility.
